title: How to Make a Peanut Butter Cup Cocktail

methods.name:
Peanut Butter Cup Infused Vodka[1]
	X
		Research source

steps.headline: Add crushed ice to a cocktail shaker.
steps.description: Fill it about halfway with ice.

steps.headline: Add the ingredients into the cocktail shaker.
Shake the contents.
steps.description: Secure the lid on and vigorously shake it for a few seconds. You will know when the contents are cold when you see condensation building up on the outside of the shaker.

steps.headline: Strain the contents.
steps.description: Attach a strainer on the cocktail shaker (if the shaker doesn't have one) and strain it into a martini glass.

steps.headline: Garnish the cocktail.
steps.description: Drizzle melted peanut butter on top of each drink.

steps.headline: Fill a hurricane glass with ice cubes.
Measure and pour the alcohol ingredients on top of the ice.
Top the glass off with the milk.
Use a bar spoon to thoroughly stir everything.
